sentences.sContent: That was the way bourgeois society valued a man.
sentences.sContent_eng: That was the way bourgeois society valued a man.
sentences.sCn: 这就是资产阶级社会评价人的方法。

sentences.sContent: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.sContent_eng: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.sCn: 他认为他们可以用他们的资产阶级思想去影响别人。

synos.tran: 资本家；九点活字；中产阶级的人；追求物质享受和社会地位者
资产阶级的；中产阶级的；贪图享受的

trans.tranCn: 资本家； 中产阶级的人
trans.tranOther: a member of the middle class, esp one regarded as being conservative and materialistic or (in Marxist thought) a capitalist exploiting the working class
